title: Album Page, "Lighthouse in Storm", ca. 1870
medium: Brush and black ink, white gouache on wove paper, mounted
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Stormy seascape with high waves crashing against lighthouse at right.  Schooner visible on the horizon, center; storm clouds echo churning seas.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Lighthouse in Storm", ca. 1870.
ca. 1870. Brush and black ink, white gouache on wove paper, mounted. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-85-13.
